source:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_00Muna Vanu is watching Eenu Vanu miss one catch after another.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
ナッキ島のムナバヌは、冒険者にお願いがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_01Muna Vanu comments that Eenu Vanu does not seem to be at his best as of late, and wishes you to inquire what is troubling the master of clouds.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

ムナバヌから、エヌバヌに力を貸してほしいと頼まれた。ナッキ島の「釣師のエヌバヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_02<tab>Eenu Vanu explains that his Zundu friend took his advice to try the fishing spots near Neverreap, but ignored his warning about going to the perilous area alone. As his friend has not returned since last sunrise, Eenu Vanu wants you to check the area to confirm his friend's well-being.
target: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_02<tab>エヌバヌから、ズンド族の釣師の様子を見てくるよう頼まれた。ガントレット諸島にいる「ズンド族の釣師」を探そう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_03<tab>Focusing entirely on the large fish biting at his line, the Zundu cloudfisher brushes off Eenu Vanu's concern and fails to notice a handful of starved paissas approach the cliff, lured by the scent of the fish basket. You slay the beasts before they have a chance to pounce on the preoccupied cloudfisher. Speak to him again to tell him how close he came to losing his day's work.
target: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_03<tab>ズンド族の釣師を襲おうとしていた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F211ED01 /var>を討伐した。ガントレット諸島の「ズンド族の釣師」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_04<tab>The Zundu cloudfisher is surprised by the attack and grateful to you for fending the paissas off, but he still wants to have one more go at the one that got away. Relay to Eenu Vanu that his cloudfisher friend will return to the village shortly.
target: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_04<tab>ズンド族の釣師と話した。彼はまだ釣りを続けるつもりらしい。ナッキ島の「釣師のエヌバヌ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_05<tab>You return to Ok' Gundu Nakki to explain what happened to Eenu Vanu, who seems relieved to know his friend is all right and will return soon. As the fishing spot near Neverreap can be an unpredictable place, he vows to go with his friend next time to make sure they have safety in numbers.
target: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_SEQ_05<tab>エヌバヌに報告した。彼によると、パイッサは釣果を狙って忍び寄ってくることがあるそうだ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_MUNAVANU_000_000<tab>Muna Vanu notices Eenu Vanu does not seem himself. Even as fishing line twitches and jerks, he looks off into distance as if storm gathers on horizon. Netherling, please help solve Eenu Vanu's troubles before food stores run dry as summer desert.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_MUNAVANU_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さま、なにやらエヌバヌに心配事がある様子。
よろしければ、彼の力になっていただけませぬか？
草木の種を運ぶ風のように、速やかにお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_010<tab>Oh... Greetings, netherling. Eenu is somewhat troubled about fellow Zundu cloudfisher. Often we swap advice on fishing spots where zephyr winds blow strongest.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_010……我を助けてくれるというのか。
感謝する、感謝する、ヒトの勇者よ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_011<tab>Eenu shares secret of fishing cliffs near sacred ground of Neverreap, and friend goes alone. But cliffs are home to ferocious beasts, and greedy Vundu cloudfishers swarm the area like midges to wisent dung.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_011実は、実は、ズンド族の釣師に穴場を教えたのだが、
奴が穴場へ向かったきり、いつまで経っても帰らんのだ。
魔物が多い場所ゆえ、崩れかけの浮島を目にするが如く心配でな。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_012<tab>Even though friend says he is not afraid of such things, Eenu worries about danger of fishing alone in Vundu territory, and has not heard from him since last sunrise. Would netherling check on his well-being?
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_012穴場はお主らヒトが「ガントレット諸島」と呼ぶ場所の、
ネバーリープを臨む浮島にある。
ズンド族の釣師の様子を、見てきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_013<tab>Eenu must stay and catch village's next meal, but netherling need not fear going alone─<var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> looks strong enough to scare away Vundu, beast, and fish!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_013穴場はお主らヒトが「ガントレット諸島」と呼ぶ場所の、
ネバーリープを臨む浮島にある。
「ズンド族の釣師」の様子を、見てきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_015<tab>Bah, even small gust of wind sends Eenu Vanu into fit of worry! Hush now, netherling. Zephyr winds bring fat cloudfish nibbling on my line!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_015……エヌバヌさんに言われて、様子を見にきた？
悪いけど、悪いけど、いまいいところなんだよ。
パイッサが来たわけでもあるまいし、邪魔しないでよ！

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_020<tab>Noisy netherling scares away big catch! ...Oh? Paissas try to steal my fish? If clumsy paissa startles me, I fall into cloud sea! Netherling deserves show of thanks for saving me from hungry paissas!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_020君がうるさいから魚が逃げ……え、パイッサが襲ってきた！？
さっぱり、さっぱり、気がつかなかったよ！
ありがとう、君は真冬の木の芽のように雄々しいよ！

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_021<tab>Fat cloudfish escapes from line, but soon zephyr winds bring him back to me. Tell Eenu that I linger a little longer, then return to swap stories over campfire.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_021もうパイッサも来ないだろうし、僕は釣りを続けるよ。
あと少し粘れば、大物が釣れそうなんだよ！
エヌバヌさんには、よろしく伝えておいてよ！

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_030<tab>Paissas sneak up behind him to steal fish!? Eenu thought Vundu cloudfishers more threatening, but he did not know even paissas can be dangerous.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_030……そうか、そうか、まだ釣りを続けているか。
だが、奴をパイッサから守ってくれて、
吹き抜ける西風のように強く感謝する。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_031<tab>Cloudfishers concentrate very hard on big catch, and sometimes forget surroundings. A surprise at wrong time can prove fatal, but death by ungainly paissa...thought mortifies Vanu worse than forgetting sundrop dance!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_031パイッサどもは、時折釣果を狙い、忍び寄ってくる。
故に、故に、いかに釣りの最中であったとしても、
背後を警戒せねばならぬのだ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_032<tab>He will return to village soon? Good. Next time, Eenu goes with friend so he is not alone at mercy of sneaky paissas. He thanks netherling for saving friend from terrible fate.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_EENUVANU_000_032釣りに夢中になるあまり、忍び寄るパイッサに気付かぬとは。
まったく、まったく、奴は岩を穿つ水滴の如き粘り強さを持つが、
こうなっては問題だな、やれやれ……。

source: TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_032<tab>Zephyr winds sure to bring fat cloudfish back to me. Tell Eenu Vanu I return to village soon to show him biggest catch of day!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN203_02183_VANUFISHER02183_000_032もうパイッサも来ないだろうし、僕は釣りを続けるよ。
あと少し粘れば、大物が釣れそうなんだよ！
エヌバヌさんには、よろしく伝えておいてよ！
